The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 November is 1,324,742 (2,353.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 19 November, there were 129,610 new confirmed cases (230.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 November, there were 154,347 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (24,737 fewer cases).
